REGISTER_FORM_USER_EXISTS: User with this username already exists.
COMPETITION_PAGE_WELCOME_MESSAGE: Our site with brand new look!
COMPETITION_PAGE_RULES_1: Contest duration: 2 Weeks from start date (Date TBA).
COMPETITION_PAGE_RULES_2: Team with highest trading volume in the contest peroid wins(1st: $4500; 2nd: $2500; 3rd: $1000).
COMPETITION_PAGE_RULES_3: Each participant has to register and log in to the website
COMPETITION_PAGE_RULES_4: Each participant must choose a team to participate
COMPETITION_PAGE_RULES_5: Only accounts which trade during the contest will be eligible for rewards
COMPETITION_PAGE_RULES_6: Participants must join telegram or discord of their social group for reward distribution
COMPETITION_PAGE_RULES_7: Social group leaders decide on fair distribution of the rewards and Krypo.Army team mediates the fair distribution
COMPETITION_PAGE_RULES_8: Leaders may increase the price pool to incentives engagement in the contest
COMPETITION_PAGE_RULES_9: If you do not have a team, check in at the Krypto.Army Official chat channel, where you will receive links to socials of the participating groups
COMPETITION_PAGE_TEAM_CARD_CONFIRMATION: Onced confirmed you can not change your team.
COMPETITION_PAGE_TEAM_CARD_ACCEPT_RULES: By joining you accept the Rules of Competition.
BUY_PAGE_NOTE_HEADING: Buying crypto is now easier then ever!
BUY_PAGE_NOTE_START_JOURNEY: Do you want to start your journey with cryptocurrencies but you don’t know where to begin?
BUY_PAGE_NOTE_INTRODUCTION: With our support of more than 170 countries and territories you can buy cryptocurrencies from almost anywhere in the world in a few simple steps!
BUY_PAGE_NOTE_ASSURANCE: Our platform is fully compliant and safe to use.
BUY_PAGE_CHOOSE_CRYPTO: Choose what you want to buy and how you want to pay:
BUY_PAGE_FORM_PAY_VALUE_INPUT_PLACEHOLDE: Amount that you want to pay with
TRADE_SETTINGS_POPUP_TRANSACTION_SPEED_D: Adjust the gas price (transaction fee) for your transaction. Higher GWEI = higher speed = higher fees
TRADE_SETTINGS_POPUP_EXPERT_MODE_DESCRIP: Bypasses confirmation modals and allows high slippage trades. Use at your own risk.
TRADE_SETTINGS_POPUP_DISABLE_MULTIHOPS_D: Restricts swaps to direct pairs only.
TRADE_SETTINGS_POPUP_SOUND_DESCRIPTION: Turn on or off the sound when trade is made.
TRADE_FORM_SLIPPAGE_INPUT_NO_EXPERT_MODE: Enable expert mode to set that high slippage
TRADE_FORM_CONFIRMATION_POPUP_ESTIMATION: Input is estimated. You will sell at most {{value}} {{token}} or the transaction will revert.
TRADE_FORM_CONFIRMATION_POPUP_MAX_SOLD_T: Your transaction will revert if there is a large, unfavorable price movement before it is confirmed.
TRADE_FORM_CONFIRMATION_POPUP_PRICE_IMPA: The difference between the market price and your price due to trade size.
TRADE_FORM_CONFIRMATION_POPUP_LQ_PROVIDE: A portion of each trade (0.30%) goes to liquidity providers and Bank stakers as a protocol incentive.
TRADE_FORM_CONFIRMATION_WALLET_POPUP_CON: Confirm the transaction in your wallet
REFER_PAGE_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP_1_DESCRIPTI: Wyślij swój reflink znajomym i opowiedz im, o naszej platformie!
REFER_PAGE_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP_2_DESCRIPTI: Zaproś znajomych, aby zarejestrowali się w naszej platformie za pomocą Twojego reflinku
REFER_PAGE_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP_3_DESCRIPTI: Za każdym razem, gdy Twój znajomy używa narzędzi dochodu pasywnego i naszego DEX-a, zarabiasz pieniądze!
REFER_PAGE_REF_PROGRAM_DESCRIPTION: Ważną częścią naszej platformy jest hojny program dzielenia się przychodami. Każdy jest w stanie zarabiać, polecając krypto.army.Wkrótce dodamy dodatkowe opcje, w tym listę poleconych osób w pierwszej i drugiej linii, zakładkę z miesięcznymi zarobkami oraz łączne i aktualne zarobki, dzięki czemu zawsze będziesz mógł zobaczyć, ile pieniędzy zarobiłeś. Aby otrzymać reflink, musisz zarejestrować się za pomocą swojego adresu e-mail. Twój unikalny link polecający zostanie wygenerowany automatycznie podczas procesu rejestracji. Pamiętaj, im więcej osób i wolumenu przyniesiesz na naszą platformę, tym więcej pieniędzy zarobisz i tym więcej tokenów otrzymasz z airdropa w momencie wydania naszego tokena! W kolejnej zakładce znajdziesz dodatkowe informacje dotyczące programu.
REFER_PAGE_EXPLAINATION_DESCRIPTION: Program składa się z 2 poziomów - zarabiasz na przychodach generowanych przez każdego, kto skorzystał przy rejestracji z Twojego reflinka, oraz na przychodach generowanych przez wszystkich użytkowników zreferowanych przez osobę, która użyła Twojego reflinka!
REFER_PAGE_TIERS_1_BENEFITS: Revenue from 0 to $999 a month. Payout 10% from 1st line & 5% from 2nd line - 15% together from both lines
REFER_PAGE_TIERS_1_BODY: This is where everyone starts. You stay in tier 1 until your referred friends generate more than $1000 of revenue in one month. In this tier we will share with you 10% of revenues from your 1st line and 5% from the second. As an example: to generate $500 of revenue your friends would have to either deposit $50,000 into our passive income protocols or generate the volume of $ 335,000 on our DEX in one month. $335k of monthly volume is equal to around 10k of daily volume. Both revenues from the DEX and passive income protocols count together.
REFER_PAGE_TIERS_2_BENEFITS: Revenue from $1000 to $9999 a month. Payout 12% from 1st line & 6% from 2nd line - 18% together from both lines
REFER_PAGE_TIERS_2_BODY: To get to the second tier your referrals have to generate at least $1000 of monthly revenue. As an example to generate this number your friends would have to either: deposit over $100,000 into our passive income protocols in one month or generate the volume of over $ 670,000 on our DEX in one month (around $20k of daily volume). If you referred 20 people and each of them makes one transaction a day, worth around $1000 this would put you in the 2nd tier. Remember, we always count the combined revenues from the DEX and passive income protocols.
REFER_PAGE_TIERS_3_BENEFITS: Revenue from $10000 to $99999 a month. Payout 14% from 1st line & 7% from 2nd line - 21% together from both lines
REFER_PAGE_TIERS_3_BODY: You get to tier 3 if your referral revenues from last month exceed $10000. To achieve this level your referral would either have to deposit over $1,000,000 in our earning protocols or generate DEX volume of at least $6,700,000 in one month (or the combination of both).
REFER_PAGE_TIERS_4_BENEFITS: Revenue over $100000 in one month. Payout 16% from 1st line & 8% from 2nd line - 24% together from both lines
REFER_PAGE_TIERS_4_BODY: To qualify to the highest tier your referrals have to generate over $100,000 of monthly revenue. This could be done be either Depositing at lease $10,000,000 into passive income protocols Generating over $67,000,000 of monthly DEX volume (around $2,250,000 daily) Or combination of both
REFER_PAGE_FOOTER: W tym momencie pracujemy nad systemem księgowania wszystkich transakcji na żywo co umożliwi nam już wkrótce wizualizację aktualnych danych z każdej struktury. Do końca tego miesiąca, po zalogowaniu, będziesz mógł na bieżąco śledzić wyniki swojej struktury, ilość poleconych na każdym z dwóch poziomów oraz przeglądać historyczne dane. Tutaj znajdziesz pełny regulamin programu referencyjnego → https://krypto.army/terms
